#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gi(x) scanf("%d",&x) 
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(p) p.begin(),p.end()
int main(){
	int t;
	gi(t);
	while(t--){
		string s;
		string t;
		cin>>s;
		cin>>t;
		int slen=s.length();
		int tlen=t.length();
		int flag=0;
		int state=0;
		int i=0;
		int j=0;
		while(1){
			if(state==0){
				if(s[i]==t[j]){
					i++;
					j++;
					if(i==slen || j==tlen){
						//cout<<"case 1"<<endl;
						break;
					}
				}
				else{
					//cout<<"change "<<i<<" "<<j<<endl;
					state=1;
					i++;
					if(i==slen){
						//cout<<"case 2"<<endl;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			else{
				if(s[i]==t[j]){
					i++;
					j++;
					if(i==slen || j==tlen){
						//cout<<"case 3"<<endl;
						break;
					}
				}
				else{
					flag=1;
					//cout<<"case 4"<<endl;
					break;
				}

			}
		}
		if(flag==0)
			cout<<"1";
		else
			cout<<"0";
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
